Actuation.label: Actuation
Actuation.description: This IPSO object is dedicated to remote actuation such as ON/OFF action or dimming. A multi-state output can also be described as a string. This is useful to send pilot wire orders for instance. It also provides a resource to reflect the time that the device has been switched on.

On_Off.label: On/Off
On_Off.description: On/off control. Boolean value where True is On and False is Off.

Dimmer.label: Dimmer
Dimmer.description: This resource represents a dimmer setting, which has an Integer value between 0 and 100 as a percentage.

On_time.label: On time
On_time.description: The time in seconds that the device has been on. Writing a value of 0 resets the counter.

Muti-state_Output.label: Muti-state Output
Muti-state_Output.description: A string describing a state for multiple level output such as Pilot Wire.

Application_Type.label: Application Type
Application_Type.description: The application type of the sensor or actuator as a string depending on the use case.
